description:
gotest: make it easier to get the help string
Because gotest's args are mingled with the tests, it's
hard to get the usage message to print. This CL adds
explicit support for -help, spelled several different ways.
Gotest has special flags like -file that are somewhat
hidden otherwise.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

LGTM

If you move the switch after the if you can cut half the cases.

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=c9ac5277abec ***

gotest: make it easier to get the help string
Because gotest's args are mingled with the tests, it's
hard to get the usage message to print. This CL adds
explicit support for -help, spelled several different ways.
Gotest has special flags like -file that are somewhat
hidden otherwise.

R=golang-dev, rsc
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5298052

subject: code review 5298052: gotest: make it easier to get the help string
